db:article.db:para: With a bootable micro SD card your i.MX6 Quad board can run the INTEGRITY monolith application on the board. To create the bootable SD card:

db:listitem.db:para: Format the SD card with a FAT32 filesystem.
Save the demo.image file (built with mkimage in Building U-Boot Image) and the device tree blob file imx6q-sabrelite.dtb for the i.MX6 Quad board under your SD card root.

db:note.db:para: You will find the device tree blob file in your INTEGRITY installation, under the path /usr/ghs/int1144/platform-cortex-a9/imx6-sabrelite/imx6q-sabrelite.dtb.

db:listitem.db:para: Set the SD card into your i.MX6 Quad board.
